formSchema.usernameSize: Username must contain at least 5 characters
formSchema.passwordCharMin: Password must contain at least 8 characters !
formSchema.passwordOneLetterLower: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter !
formSchema.passwordOneLetterUpper: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter !
formSchema.passwordOneNumber: Password must contain at least 1 number !
formSchema.passwordOneSymbol: Password must contain at least 1 special character !
